about_the_game:
Flexing its muscles all the way to the finish line, you can count on the otherworldly Superman™ car for the win! Like the hero who inspired it, it's the embodiment of strength and power, and its aerodynamic line is really designed to make you fly on the track!

You don't even have to take off its glasses or put it in a phone booth: with the legendary S printed on the chest… I mean… the hood, this sports car is ready to show its superpowers and put your opponents to the test. And the good news is that there is no Kryptonite in HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED™! This is a super car!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1
detailed_description:
Flexing its muscles all the way to the finish line, you can count on the otherworldly Superman™ car for the win! Like the hero who inspired it, it's the embodiment of strength and power, and its aerodynamic line is really designed to make you fly on the track!

You don't even have to take off its glasses or put it in a phone booth: with the legendary S printed on the chest… I mean… the hood, this sports car is ready to show its superpowers and put your opponents to the test. And the good news is that there is no Kryptonite in HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED™! This is a super car!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

name: HOT WHEELS™ - Superman™

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-5820K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Flexing its muscles all the way to the finish line, you can count on the otherworldly Superman™ car for the win! The embodiment of strength and power, it's ready to fly you through the track! Put your opponents to the test with its cosmic superpowers!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
